Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Maximin 5  (natural AMPs; UCLL1a; toad, amphibians, animals)
Sequence Information.Source: Chinese red belly toad,Bombina maxima, Yunnan, China, Asia

Literature Information.Literature: Activity: Active against E.coli ATCC25922 (ND), S. aureus ATCC2592 (MIC3.6 uM), B. pyocyaneus CMCCB10104 (MIC 7.2 uM), B. megatherium (MIC 12 uM), B. dysenterium (MIC 12 uM), K. pneumoniae (MIC 3.6 uM),  C. albicans ATCC2002 (MIC 1.2 uM), A. flavus IFFI4015 (MIC 12 ug/ml), and P. uticale IFFI2001 (MIC 12 ug/ml).active only against cancer cells C8166 (IC50 34.4 ug/ml) but not other cancer cell lines tested (IC50 > 50 ug/ml).It also has anti-HIV (EC50 39.8 ug/ml) and spermicidal effects.In vitro toxicity:  IC50 34.4 ug/ml, against HIV-1 cell selectivity index 0.88(Lai R et al., 2012). Updated 2/2012; 12/2015; 11/2024 GW.
Literature Information.Author: Lai R, Zheng Y-T, Shen J-H, Liu GJ, Liu H, Lee W-H, Tang S-Z., Zhang Y.2002.
Literature Information.Title: Antimicrobial peptides from skin secretions of Chinese red belly toad Bombina maxima.
